channel.title: Agreesive NPC is still following me past allowed coords?
channel.description:
Okay well I made my corporal beats but when i run away, he follows me. I thought that this would work but it doesnt:
[code]spawn = 2697 2869 3593 0 2877 3598 2858 3588 1 Corp Beast[/code]

item.title: Agreesive NPC is still following me past allowed coords?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

public boolean isInAllowed() {
        if ((absX >= RangeX1 && absX <= rangeX2 && absY >= rangeY1 && absY <= rangeY2) {
        return true;
        }else{
         return false;
         }
}

Something like that, But you would have to declare the ranges. (rangeX1, ect.)

Read full topic
